Mayor's Office - Contact Information
------------------------------------

Use the Contact information to the right to contact Mayor Watson, or contact his staff using the information below.

### Contact the Mayor's Office

[Mayor Kirk Watson](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/mayorwatson)
[512-978-2100](tel:1-512-978-2100)

If you have an event invitation for Mayor Watson, please email:
[Tiegan.Bradley@austintexas.gov](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/tieganbradley)

For requests related to international relations, please contact:
[international.relations@austintexas.gov](mailto:international.relations@austintexas.gov "mailto:international.relations@austintexas.gov")

### Mayor's Staff:

* Manages Council Meetings and Council Affairs, Human Resources, Internships, Intergovernmental Affairs, Building Services
* [512-978-2100](tel:1-512-978-2100)
* [Email Colleen](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/colleenpate)

**Senior Policy Strategist - Max Lars**

* [Email Max](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/maxlars)

**Senior Policy Advisor - Louisa Brinsmade**

* Public Health, Homelessness, Community Violence, Austin Energy, Austin Water, Climate/Environment
* [Email Louisa](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/louisabrinsmade)

**Communications Strategist - Rebecca Szeto**

* [Email Rebecca](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/rebeccaszeto)

**Policy Advisor- Alexis Garcia**

* [Email Alexis](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/alexisgarcia)

**Policy Advisor- Jasmine Stoughton**

* [Email Jasmine](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/jasminehoughton)

* [Email Philip](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/philipdulin "Email")

Do you have a question or issue regarding a City service or department? You can
[report a concern](https://www.austintexas.gov/department/report-concern)
using one of our quick and convenient reporting options.
